name: The Amazing Time Adventures of Billy Jones
name_original: The Amazing Time Adventures of Billy Jones
description:
I am Billy Jones. I made a machine that can rewind time. To rewind time I can go to a portal but if I go in can't return. I'm working at a method to return in 2019. I'm close to finding what I need.

Sometimes my body doesn't do what I want. It's like i'd have second brain.

Well, I shall go to my work. Be well !
